oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Program for reunion of 13th Tenn. Cavalry Association
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Seventh Annual Reunion of this Carter County unit, the 13th Tenn. Cavalry Association, (13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA) was held at Stony Creek on Sept. 17-18, 1902. This program details the order of business for this two-day event. Provisions are to be provided "to entertain all Federal, Confederate and Spanish-American Soldiers and their friends."
